answers.answer: Girl, I'm 20 weeks 5 days and my feet and hands swell! I've noticed it more with the heat, I'm from the south. Also depends.on if I'm riding in a car, standing, or whatever.  Today the felt like they were going to pop!
Yea I'm n the south also...n I was off today! Just shocked lol thought I had a few more months
Check with your Dr. Swelling can be a sign of preeclampsia
All my vitals have been great. I've had preeclampsia twice. Now I don't have that, I do have gestational diabetes :( but managing it well!

Yea all my vitals have been ok also. But I am a insulin dependent diabetic. :(  My doctors are scared I'm going to have preeclampsia early on! I was just there last week and I was fine. Can preeclampsia start that fast?

question: Is it normal to have my feet swollen already at 21 weeks? I literally have crankles right...thought this was something that happens around 7 mths
title: crankles
